description: Exploring Osaka - Japan's kitchen! Food adventures and city sights.

reservations.name: Hiroshima Guesthouse ROOM3
reservations.description: Family-run guesthouse in central Hiroshima hosted by Kunihiro - second night of stay, check-out 10:00 AM December 8th

reservations.name: Okonomimura
reservations.description: Famous okonomiyaki theme park in Hiroshima with multiple floors of okonomiyaki stalls - iconic dining experience
reservations.notes: Multi-story okonomiyaki complex with various vendors

meals: Multiple street food experiences - takoyaki, okonomiyaki, kushikatsu
notes: Osaka is famous for food! Try everything. Dotonbori is busiest in evening.
